item.title: Tools Rosetta Stone
item.description: This is mostly just a list of things to remind me what to install when I reformat / start using a new PC. But I decided I would share anyway. The prompt for creating this table wss actually discovering ksnip which resolved a lot of my cross platform screen shot pains. Tool Windows Linux Mac OS X Comments Screen shots ksnip ksnip ksnip Picking this up helped a lot as it was a major missing piece, I had tried things like, Shutter which became dependency hell every update as it isn’t a compiled tool and wasn’t cross platform.
